title: GOP Rot Continues, Subway’s Tuna Secret? 1.29.21
itunes:title: GOP Rot Continues, Subway’s Tuna Secret? 1.29.21
description:
In episode 801, Jack and Miles are joined by Stuff They Don't Want You To Know and Ridiculous History's Ben Bowlin to discuss Marjorie Taylor Greene, vaccine doses, online trading barriers set by Robinhood, Subway tuna, Candy Kraft Mac & Cheese, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Taylor Greene tests McCarthy with caustic comments
  2. Marjorie Taylor Greene indicated support for executing prominent Democrats in 2018 and 2019 before running for Congress
  3. Health Workers, Stuck in the Snow, Administer Coronavirus Vaccine to Stranded Drivers
  4. Online investor army takes wallop with trading barriers
  5. Subway’s tuna is not tuna, but a ‘mixture of various concoctions,’ a lawsuit alleges
  6. Oh no oh no candy-flavored mac and cheese oh no
  7. Kraft unveils Valentine's Day mac 'n' cheese, social media responds
  8. Kraft mac and cheese is now a breakfast food, apparently
  9. 'Ain't no basic batch': Kraft Dinner launching pumpkin spice mac and cheese
  10. Angry Moms And QAnon Believers Attacked Kraft's "Send Noods" Campaign For Sexualizing Mac 'N' Cheese
  11. A single factory is now working 24/7 to keep Kraft Dinner on grocery shelves
  12. Kraft Heinz factories are working three shifts a day to keep up with demand
  13. Two Kraft Heinz workers test positive for coronavirus
  14. Marvelous Macaroni and Cheese
  15. Rationing
  16. WATCH: Domenique Dumont - Le Debut De La Fin

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
